title: Australian diary. No. 129
creator_credit: John Martin-Jones and Department of the Interior
brief_description: Magazine items: North West Cape; the development of the communications centre for space tracking in the north west cape area and the construction of a United States naval radio station near the new town of Exmouth. The role of the Standards Association of Australia in modern industry. The Snowy Mountains - Thredbo Alpine Village is a sign of the sudden popularity of winter sports.
